name: Nommons Math Explorers
description:
Blast-off and explore the universe with the Nommons, the alien civilization that’s powered by math!

Learn addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division as you answer questions in order to unlock new parts for your spacecraft. After you’ve assembled your ship, it’s time to equip it with power-ups and take off!
Steer your ship with a swipe of a finger as you avoid obstacles, bounce on top of enemies, collect candy, and rescue the stranded Nommons that you pass along the way.

Do you have what it takes to join the Nommons: Math Explorers?

LEARN
Quickly solve problems using addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division before the timer runs out.

BUILD
Create your own universe in build mode! Use pieces of candy to unlock and customize the environment, enemies, obstacles, rewards in this fun and replayable mode. No two levels in Nommons: Math Explorers are ever the same.

SHARE
Let your friends and family play through your unique Nommons: Math Explorers levels, no matter where they are in the universe with our level editor feature! Send your unique code to a friend they’ll be able to replicate your level.

COMIC
Unlock collectible comics and learn more about the Nommons’ backstory as you play through the game. Can you collect them all?
